import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homepage-introduction', templateUrl: './homepage-introduction.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homepage-introduction.component.scss'] }) export class HomepageIntroductionComponent { }

About us

Welcome to Loyd School of Driving

Our mission is to cultivate confident and skilled drivers, nurturing their potential to become true professionals behind the wheel.

Loyd School of Driving is a fully accredited driver training provider located in Cape Town, dedicated to delivering high-quality driving lessons tailored to individuals of various skill levels. With our team of professional instructors, you'll gain the knowledge and confidence needed to excel on the road.

500+ Licenses Granted!

Whether it's Code 08 or Code 10, our driving school has paved the way for countless success stories.

Have questions?

+27 78 332 1679
